action.text: Amendment SA 270 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 270 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 57. Record Vote Number: 168.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 311(a)(2)(B) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 270.
Amendment SA 270 proposed by Senator McConnell to Amendment SA 267.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 270 proposed by Senator McConnell to Amendment SA 267.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 270 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 57. Record Vote Number: 168.
